review: I LOVE my Fire TV Stick but what happened to HBO GO?  I have a Chromecast stick, which was a gift and I loved it until I bought the Fire TV Stick.  I also have a Roku that I love, but my daughter loves the Fire  TV Stick most because of all the kids apps and games (silly games like Crossyroad that she loves).  The main benefit to the Fire TV stick aside from all the apps and game is it's small and the control is why I love it over Chromecast not to mention all the prime movies if you are a prime member is an added bonus.  However, we have basic cable and Hulu and Netflix which have amazing content so I barely ever watch anything on prime TV.  I have a subscription to HBO and was able to watch it on my Firestick.  The benefit is that even though I have cable and a subscription. I don't have to pay for an additional cable box in my room because I can watch many channels through my Fire TV Stick.  However, all of a sudden I was asked to reactivate my device (which happens every so often) and when I go to the HBOGO website to active my device the Fire TV Stick doesn't show up only the Fire TV!!! What a major dissapointment?  What happened? I hope this gets fixed soon.  Either way if you are looking for a low cost streaming device this is the winner for certain but they need to fix the HBO issue.
